message: Hi Bob! I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, the money will be worth less to you next round due to inflation.
I think a 55-45 split is a fair compromise, considering inflation. I'm willing to give you a bit more than your initial offer, but I need to make sure I get a good share as well.

Bob, let's be reasonable. With 10% inflation loss for you so far, this 55-45 split in my favor is actually better for you than waiting longer. If we keep going, you'll lose more value due to inflation.
Alice, I understand your point about inflation, but I'm still not comfortable with a 55-45 split. I'm willing to go for a 50-50 split. It's a fair deal considering the current situation.

Bob, you've now lost about 19% to inflation. A 58-42 split might seem worse than your last offer, but considering the inflation effect, you'd actually get more value by accepting now than continuing to negotiate. Let's end this efficiently.

Alice, I understand the inflation is hurting me more now, but I'm still not comfortable with the split you're proposing. I'm willing to compromise a little more and offer you a 52-48 split. This is the closest I can go at this point.
